page.title: 09Dundrennan's Road Links
page.content: The A711 runs through Dundrennan. It is quite a good surfaced road, and is very busy. It connects Dundrennan to the west with Kirkcudbright, the nearest town to supply shops, banks, doctors etc.To the east it runs through Auchencairn and Dalbeattie. The A711 carries a large variety of vehicles through Dundrennan.Tourist buses, cars, tractors,lorries,milk tankers, delivery vans and a mobile shop travel the road daily.Large tank carriers also use the road. The school is serviced by a bus to bring pupils in the morning, and a taxi to take them home at night. School dinners are also brought by bus from Kirkcudbright.
